long_description: Featuring a quiet, grease-free Gates belt drive with a smooth-shifting, 11-speed internal hub, the Raleigh Misceo 4.0 Bike offer a luxurious ride on urban streets. Lighweight, butted aluminum frame features upright geometry and a flat handlebar so you can sit comfortably and see everything around you. Gates Center Track belt drive replaces a traditional chain, creating a quieter ride and decreasing the need for maintainence. Belt drive and internally geared rear hub allow for easy shifting through all 11 speeds; it's geared for climbing hills as well as cruising flats. Shimano Alfine trigger shifters are intuitively easy to use and deliver smooth shifting. Shimano Alfine hydraulic disc brakes provide smooth, responsive deceleration. 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets alike. Convenient platform pedals accept most casual shoes. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). Specs on the Raleigh Misceo 4.0 Bike are subject to change.
